h2_title: How to Unlock the Rock Solid Spell
content: Once you have the spell, visit a Keeper's Shrine and select Self-Advance to see the option to Set Spells. Replace Cloud Step with Rock Solid, and you're ready to start parrying.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Parry.md', within the main section titled 'How to Parry', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock the Rock Solid Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Once you have the spell, visit a Keeper's Shrine and select Self-Advance to see the option to Set Spells. Replace Cloud Step with Rock Solid, and you're ready to start parrying.
